scripts.test: yarn run lint-nginx && yarn run lint-scss
scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js && yarn run build-jekyll
scripts.build-css: sass sass/main.scss css/main.css --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace css/**/*.css
scripts.build-js: yarn run build-global-nav && yarn run build-cookie-policy
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
